name: VintageRadio
0:
”Alexa, Open Vintage radio”
”Alexa, ask Vintage Radio for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vintage radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bringing you just a few of the thousands of episodes found on the Vintage Radio iPhone app and on http://www.vintageradioshows.com/. This skill opens the world of old-time radio broadcasting to your Alexa device.

How to play?
Alexa, open Vintage Radio
Alexa, Ask Vintage Radio for help

Other capabilities:

"Alexa, pause " – pause the current play.
"Alexa, stop" – stops the current play.
"Alexa, resume" – will resume the paused or stopped show.
"Alexa, shuffle on" – play shows in random order.
Alexa, shuffle off" – play shows as per the retrieved sequence.
"Alexa, next" – plays the next show.
"Alexa, previous" – plays the previous show.

Thank you all for your feedback. A new version of Vintage Radio is in the works with more shows and new features. Thanks for your patience and continued support.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
